set(quiche_nghttp2_SOURCES
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2.h
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_adapter.cc

  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_data_provider.h
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_session.cc
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_session.h
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_util.cc
  src/quiche/http2/adapter/nghttp2_util.h
  )
if (NOT USE_NGHTTP2)
  set(quiche_nghttp2_SOURCES)
endif()

set(quiche_protos
  src/quiche/quic/core/proto/cached_network_parameters.proto
  src/quiche/quic/core/proto/crypto_server_config.proto
  src/quiche/quic/core/proto/source_address_token.proto
  )

set(PROTOBUF_IMPORT_DIRS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src)
protobuf_generate_cpp(quiche_protos_SRCS quiche_protos_HDRS ${quiche_protos})

# TODO re-add quic code if http3 support is added
add_library(quiche STATIC
  ${quiche_SRCS}
  #${quiche_quic_SOURCES}
  ${quiche_nghttp2_SOURCES}
  #${quiche_protos_SRCS}
  )

target_include_directories(quiche PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/overrides
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/src
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../googleurl
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/..
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../src
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../
  src/quiche/common/platform/default
  src
  )

# TODO re-add quic code if http3 support is added
target_link_libraries(quiche PUBLIC
  #libprotobuf-lite
  ${ZLIB_LIBRARIES}
  crypto
  ssl
  url
  asio
  absl::container_common
  absl::btree
  absl::flat_hash_map
  absl::flat_hash_set
  absl::inlined_vector
  absl::node_hash_map
  absl::hash
  absl::memory
  absl::int128
  absl::status
  absl::statusor
  absl::strings
  absl::str_format
  absl::time
  absl::optional
  absl::span

  absl::synchronization
  absl::stacktrace
  absl::symbolize
  absl::flags
  absl::flags_parse
  absl::flags_marshalling
  )

if (USE_NGHTTP2)
  target_include_directories(quiche PUBLIC ${NGHTTP2_INCLUDE_DIRS})
  target_link_directories(quiche PUBLIC ${NGHTTP2_LIBRARY_DIRS})
  target_link_libraries(quiche PUBLIC ${NGHTTP2_LIBRARIES})
endif()

if (COMPILER_CLANG)
  set_target_properties(quiche PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-Wno-missing-prototypes -Wno-implicit-fallthrough -Wno-format-nonliteral")
elseif (COMPILER_GCC)
  set_target_properties(quiche PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-Wno-missing-declarations -Wno-implicit-fallthrough -Wno-format-nonliteral -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-deprecated-copy -Wno-unused-but-set-variable -Wno-strict-overflow")
elseif (COMPILER_MSVC)
  set_target_properties(quiche PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "/wd4267 /wd4244 /wd4068 /wd4305 /wd4309 /wd4334 /DQUIC_FRAME_DEBUG=0")
endif()

if (USE_BALSA_HTTP_PARSER)
  add_library(balsa STATIC
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_enums.h
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_frame.h
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_headers.h
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_headers_sequence.h
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_visitor_interface.h
    src/quiche/balsa/framer_interface.h
    src/quiche/balsa/header_api.h
    src/quiche/balsa/header_properties.h
    src/quiche/balsa/http_validation_policy.h
    src/quiche/balsa/noop_balsa_visitor.h
    src/quiche/balsa/simple_buffer.h
    src/quiche/balsa/standard_header_map.h
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_enums.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_frame.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_headers.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/balsa_headers_sequence.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/header_properties.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/simple_buffer.cc
    src/quiche/balsa/standard_header_map.cc
    )

  target_include_directories(balsa PUBLIC
    src
    )

  target_link_libraries(balsa PUBLIC
    quiche
    absl::flat_hash_map
    absl::flat_hash_set
    absl::memory
    absl::strings)
endif()
